Package org.szemeremajax.backend.models

Class Board

java.lang.Object
org.szemeremajax.backend.models.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Board extends Object implements Cloneable
This class holds information about a game of checkers. Like all the pieces and which side is to move next.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Board()
    Creates an empty board with white to move.
    Board(Piece[] board, Alliance sideToMove)
    Creates a board with the given pieces and side to move.
